content.rendered:
These codes can be used on Amazon, eBay, iTunes, and more. They are GS1-Verified, and we offer money back guarantee within 30 days. You can see our bulk UPC pricing below.

✔️ Instant Digital Delivery, Use Immediately
✔️ 12 Digit UPCs and Barcode Files Included, Ready to Use!
✔️ High Resolution PNG, JPG, TIFF, and PDF Included with Any Format Available
✔️ Works Online and Retailers Worldwide
✔️ No Renewal Fees or Hidden Charges!

Have any questions? Checkout our FAQ or reach out to us, we’re here to help.

5000 UPC Codes $550 ($0.11 Each) Buy Now

15000+ UPC Codes Contact Us Contact Us

You can find the UPCs.com pricing above.  You can buy 1, or 50,000+ – we can supply as many as you need.  We strive to offer the cheapest price, so if you know of cheaper, let us know and we’ll beat it.

Every order is delivered instantly upon payment and can be used immediately!

How Many Codes Do I Need?

Every unique product you sell needs to have its own unique UPC Barcode.  This is such that inventory can be scanned in and out and tracked effectively.  It also allows systems to manage duplicate products and ensure inventory doesn’t become mixed.  If you have 3 T-Shirts, each shirt has 3 colors, and each color has 3 sizes, you will need 3 x 3 x 3 = 27 UPC Barcodes.  Below is another example:

You are welcome to purchase as many codes as you need, whenever they want.  They don’t expire and there are no renewal fees.  Barcodes are issued by UPCs.com and are valid GS1 codes which work worldwide.  They are used to uniquely identify products in retail stores around the world and online at shops such as Amazon, eBay, and iTunes.  You can buy 1 barcode for 1 product, or buy thousands for enterprise level commerce.  Our prices are the best online and significantly cheaper than purchasing from the GS1 directly.  100 UPC barcodes is only $45, which is our average order.

If you need any help calculating how many codes you need, or have any questions, don’t hesitate to contact us.
